values.value: Sets the product set type when EntityType = PhotoTin then, set to PhotoTin otherwise Configurable and sets to Personalizable when EntityType = PhotoTin, then set Attribute to true. Otherwise do nothing use default value. Sets value of a hidden attribute, needed for the demandware export
